de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml

Class FragmentTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml.FragmentTest

  • @PrepareForTest(value=Fragment.class)
public class FragmentTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the functionality of the xml-Fragment-class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FragmentTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setupFragment()
      initialize the fragment from file "TestFragment.xml" in the resources-folder
      void testControlNodesSetCorrectly()
      rudimentary test for checking if the controlNodes are set "correctly" (simply check if there is a node with the ID from the fragmentXML in the controlNodes-Map of the fragment)
      void testEdgesSetCorrectly()
      rudimentary test for checking if the edges are set "correctly" (simply check if there is an edge with the ID from the fragmentXML in the edges-List of the fragment)
      void testSetsSetCorrectly() 
      void testSimpleFragmentDeserialization()
      rudimentary test for checking if basic attributes like name and ID have been set correctly.
      void testVersionSetCorrectly() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
